title: Warhammer 40,000: Space Marine Collection – v1.0.165 + All DLCs
body:
Warhammer 40,000: Space Marine Collection – v1.0.165 + All DLCs


Genres/Tags: Action, Shooter, Slasher, Third-person, 3D
Companies: Relic / SEGA
Languages: RUS/ENG/MULTI9
Original Size: 8.8 GB
Repack Size: 2.1 GB [Selective Download]

Download Mirrors

  • ExtraTorrent [magnet] [.torrent file only] (MULTI9)
  • RuTor [magnet] (ENG/RUS)
  • Tapochek.net [magnet] (ENG/RUS)
  • FreeTorrents (ENG/RUS)
  • Filehoster: MegaUpload (MULTI9, 10+ hosters, interchangeable) SELECTIVE BINs REUPLOADED

Screenshots (Click to enlarge)


Repack Features

  • Based on Warhammer.40.000.Space.Marine.Collection-PROPHET ISO release: ppt-wsm9.iso (9,393,782,784 bytes)
  • Game version: v1.0.165, 13 DLCs included and activated
  • 100% Lossless & MD5 Perfect: all files are identical to originals after installation
  • NOTHING ripped, NOTHING re-encoded
  • Selective download feature: you can skip downloading and installing voicepacks you don’t need
  • Significantly smaller archive size (compressed from 8.8 to 2.1 GB for any single language)
  • Installation takes 10-30 minutes (depending on your system)
  • After-install integrity check so you could make sure that everything installed properly
  • HDD space after installation: 8~9 GB (~10 GB during installation)
  • Use “Language Selector.exe” in game root to change the game language

    Game Description

    In Warhammer® 40,000® Space Marine® you are Captain Titus, a Space Marine of the Ultramarines chapter and a seasoned veteran of countless battles.

    A millions-strong Ork horde has invaded an Imperial Forge World, one of the planet-sized factories where the war machines for humanity’s never ending battle for survival are created. Losing this planet is not an option and be aware of the far more evil threat lurking large in the shadows of this world.
